application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Reduce Bay to height of Bush to right of it as it has become too large for homeowner to manage and wants it to be reduced back into a smaller more manageable shape. Current height 5 meters, current span 4 meters. New span 2 meters, new height 3 metersT2 Reduce two Larger extended limbs on apple tree in by circa 1 meter to balance tree crown and reduce risk of failure at ground level as there is sever decay. Current height 3 meters, current span 4 meters. New span 2 meters, new height 3 metersT3 Heavily reduce self seeded Holme Oak to crown break and trim other branches into good shape - client would like to keep the self seeded tree but keep it trimmed and maintained small bush rather than tree- current height 5m current span 3m  - leaving height 3m and span 2mT4 Reduce top of Holly tree in height by circa 1 meter and to good shape. Current height 6 meters, current span 4 meters. New height 5 meters, New span 4 metersT5 Remove two lower branches on Oak tree over greenhouse. Lifting lower branches so tey dont touch the greenhouse and allow a little more light into greenhouse. Current height 5 meter, current span 4 meters New height 5 meters New span 4 metersT6 Remove two larger Hazel stems to ground level over the greenhouse leaving smaller growth intact. These two Hazel uprights havent been coppiced in a while and have got too large and are very close to the green house.T7 Remove/lift lower branch from Sycamore over garden. Current height 15 meters, current spread 10 meters. New height 15 meters, new spread 10 metersT8 Lift Hornbeam crown over garden to 4 meters. Current height 6 meters, Current spread 5 meters. New Height 6 meters, New spread 5 meters
